titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Library Staff Association, Yale University Library, Records
Library Staff Association, Yale University Library, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:03

did.unittitle: Library Staff Association, Yale University Library, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records include agendas, minutes, correspondence, financial statements, reports, and publications documenting the activities of the Library Staff Association (formerly Managerial and Professional Staff Association) at Yale University Library.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 32-F (YRG 32-F), Records of Yale University Library staff organizations.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Library Staff Association, Yale University Library, Records (RU 186). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Managerial and Professional Staff Association became the Library Staff Association (LiSA) in 2003.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records include agendas, minutes, correspondence, financial statements, reports, and publications documenting the activities of the Managerial and Professional Staff Association (now Library Staff Association) at Yale University Library.

did.unittitle: Agenda, minutes, meetings and other related materials
Agenda, minutes, meetings and other related materials
Financial Records: check books and ledgers
Records of the Managerial and Professional Staff Association

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
